en:
Consent and Amendment Agreement - 31-05-1996 - Loan Agreement between the Federal Office of Foreign Economic Affairs representing the Government of the Swiss Confederation and the Empresa de Energia Eléctrica de Bogotà on the granting of a mixed credit for the Guavio Hydroelectric Power Project
Guarantee Agreement between the Government of the Swiss Confederation and the Government of the Republic of Colombia
fr:
Consent and Amendment Agreement - 31-05-1996 - Accord relatif à l'octroi d'un crédit mixte (de 22,5 mios francs) entre l'OFAEE et l'Empresa de Energia Eléctrica de Bogotà (EEEB)
Accord de garantie entre le Gouvernement de la Confédération suisse et le Gouvernement de la République de Colombie
